name: @scoping/scriptable
description: Write type-safe, concise, continuously-deployed Scriptable apps. Scriptable for iOS and iPadOS lets users author JavaScript procedures invokable by Apple Shortcuts, Share Sheet or Widgets, useful for home and device automation.

scripts.clean: cmd --% /c "(if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist) & (if exist build rmdir /s /q build) & (if exist .eslintcache del /f /q .eslintcache)" || rm -rf dist build .eslintcache
scripts.build: tsc && npm run build:hack && rollup --config && ts-add-js-extension --dir=dist --showprogress=false
scripts.build:hack: cmd --% /c "for %G in (core lib private) do rmdir /s /q dist\%G" || rm -rf dist/core dist/lib dist/private
scripts.postbuild: npm run lint || echo "Lint failed. Continuing..."
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:clean && npm run deploy:make && npm run deploy:copy && npm run deploy:filter && npm run deploy:rr
scripts.deploy:clean: cmd /c if exist packed rmdir /s /q packed || rm -rf packed
scripts.deploy:filter: cmd /c "(rmdir /s /q packed\_test) & (del /s /q packed\*.tsbuildinfo packed\*.d.ts packed\*.map packed\*.spec.js)" || npm run deploy:filter:default
scripts.deploy:rr: npm run deploy:rr:header && npm run deploy:rr:resolve && npm run deploy:rr:space
scripts.deploy:rr:header: npm run deploy:rr:header:icon && npm run deploy:rr:header:share && npm run deploy:rr:header:strict
scripts.deploy:rr:resolve: npm run deploy:rr:resolve:import && npm run deploy:rr:resolve:export:default && npm run deploy:rr:resolve:export:named
scripts.deploy:rr:space: npm run deploy:rr:space:outdent && npm run deploy:rr:space:sandbox
